physical_object.name: beige round bean bag / floor cushion

assignments.utilization_method: Place the bean bag upright against a wall to create a domed surface. Sweep the pen across the cloth cover, letting the shifting beads offer gradual pushback.

physical_object.name: yellow snack bag of Japanese pea crackers

assignments.utilization_method: Pinch the sealed top edge with thumb and index finger, cradle the body of the bag in the remaining fingers, and squeeze the contents toward the bottom

physical_object.name: black and silver extendable selfie stick with phone holder

assignments.utilization_method: Grip the lower rubber handle with the whole hand and use the thumb to click the small rectangular shutter button on the handle

physical_object.name: spray bottle with white nozzle and light blue liquid

assignments.utilization_method: Wrap fingers around the neck beneath the trigger, let the filled bottle act as the head, and swing the base downward for strikes
Clasp the top knob between thumb and forefinger, allowing the cylindrical body to extend downward as the chisel shaft

physical_object.name: metallic ballpoint pen with a clear barrel

assignments.utilization_method: Hold the pen in a standard tripod grip and glide its tip across a surface exactly as you would move a paint brush

physical_object.name: blue upholstered two-seat bench with black metal armrests

assignments.utilization_method: Press the controller tip against the exposed black metal armrest of the bench

physical_object.name: transparent plastic umbrella with white curved handle

assignments.utilization_method: Hold the curved handle firmly, place the umbrella tip on the floor or table surface, and move the handle in long up-and-down or side-to-side strokes
